value.title: Megvii
value.excerpt: MEGVII is a world-class AI company with core competencies in deep learning. Founded in Beijing in 2011 by Yin Qi, Tang Wenbin and Yang Mu, three Tsinghua University graduates who studied under the Turing-prize winning Chinese computer scientist and computational theorist Andrew Chi-Chih Yao, MEGVII is a pioneer in applying AI technology and computer vision algorithms to Internet of Things (IoT) use cases. The Company’s mission is to use innovative AI technology to deliver value to customers and to benefit the society as a whole.
value.name: Megvii
otherNames: 北京旷视科技有限公司

value.title: Pinpoint
value.excerpt: Pinpoint delivers a new kind of performance intelligence—one that synthesizes the work activity in your delivery tools, and applies data science to unlock faster, smarter engineering.
value.name: Pinpoint
value.overview: Pinpoint delivers a new kind of performance intelligence—one that synthesizes the work activity in your delivery tools, and applies data science to unlock faster, smarter engineering.

value.title: SparkCognition
value.excerpt: SparkCognition builds leading artificial intelligence solutions to advance the most important interests of society. We help customers analyze complex data, empower decision making, and transform human and industrial productivity with award-winning machine learning technology and expert teams focused on defense, IIoT, and finance.
value.name: SparkCognition
value.overview: SparkCognition builds leading artificial intelligence solutions to advance the most important interests of society. value.title: Zymergen
value.excerpt: Founded in 2013 and based in the San Francisco Bay Area, Zymergen integrates automation, machine learning, and genomics to rapidly accelerate the pace of scientific advancement. We treat the genome as a search space, leveraging machine learning to make discoveries far beyond the bounds of human intuition. In doing so, we deliver economic value, material diversity and performance capabilities not previously possible.

value.title: Alegion
value.excerpt: Alegion has the most powerful and flexible annotation platform for training data in market. It accelerates model development for the most sophisticated and subjective use cases. It uses integrated ML and has unique capabilities like conditional logic, iterative tasks, multi-stage and workflows, that are essential for high quality at scale.

value.title: CognitiveScale
value.excerpt: CognitiveScale is an enterprise AI software company with solutions that help customers win with intelligent, transparent and trusted AI/ML powered digital systems.
value.name: CognitiveScale
value.overview: CognitiveScale is an enterprise AI software company with solutions that help customers win with intelligent, transparent and trusted AI/ML powered digital systems.

value.title: Kabbage
value.excerpt: Kabbage Inc., headquartered in Atlanta, has pioneered the first financial services data and technology platform to provide fully automated funding to small businesses in minutes. Kabbage leverages data generated through business activity such as accounting data, online sales, shipping and dozens of other sources to understand performance and deliver fast, flexible funding in real time. In just a few years, Kabbage has become the number one online provider of working capital to small businesses in the United States and UK.
